mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (report_user_id, report_target_id, report_date, report_content, report_link, report_type) VALUES (#{reportUserId}, #{reportTargetId}, #{reportDate}, #{reportContent}, #{reportLink}, #{reportType});
mapper.select: SELECT report_no, report_user_id, report_target_id, report_date, report_content, report_link, report_type, report_proc_status FROM report WHERE report_no = #{value};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry ( INQUIRY_USER_ID, INQUIRY_TRUCK_ID, INQUIRY_TYPE, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_FILE, INQUIRY_DATE, INQUIRY_ANS_STATUS, INQUIRY_USER_ROLE) VALUES (#{inquiryUserId}, #{inquiryTruckId}, #{inquiryType}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{inquiryFile}, SYSDATE(), #{inquiryAnsStatus}, #{inquiryUserRole});
mapper.select: SELECT inner_table.* FROM ( SELECT inquiry_no, inquiry_user_id, inquiry_truck_id, inquiry_type, inquiry_title, inquiry_date, inquiry_ans_status, inquiry_user_role FROM inquiry i ORDER BY inquiry_no DESC ) inner_table limit #{startRowNum}, #{pageSize}
